column5: Good morning everyone. I want to take the kids fishing this afternoon but I'm not sure of the regulations as to where it is ok for us to go. Without getting into trouble. I live in Oshawa. I heard that you were allowed to fish south of the CN tracks, is that true? I also know that trout season starts next weekend. So what is it that we can fish for?  Thanks for all replies, the kids will appreciate them.
